and

kit authors uh for example such as those

angler uh who used to be including

base ransomware is read its ugly head

Advanced and persistent AP in short the
bad guys are getting better at what they

challenges for us as an
industry the number of devices we must

as many as 50 billion devices by the

put that in perspective there's only
between 7 and 8 billion people on the
entire
planet at the same time the small
processing and memory capabilities of

event of an
vulnerability and if we pause for a
